DOC.detailed_description: This randomise control double blind cross study investigate acute effect high flavanol ( 495mg ) compare low flavanol ( 23mg ) cocoa drink cognitive function healthy old adult population ( n=60 ) . The primary outcome measure study determine effect flavanol intervention cognitive measure executive function attention secondary measure blood pressure determine whether observed effect parallel plasma flavanol level .
